name: Twisted Innards
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Pathfinder Society Field Guide. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a cocoon tied with string)
text: For the duration of this spell, your vital organs writhe, shift, and move about, making it difficult to strike you in a vulnerable area. While this spell is in effect, critical hits and sneak attacks against you have a 25% chance of failing to inflict any additional damage—though you still take the normal damage from the attack. At 7th level, the chance to ignore additional damage increases to 50%, while at 13th level the chance increases to 75%.
text_zh: 在法术持续时间内，妳身体的重要器官扭转移位，让人很难打中妳脆弱的地方。在法术生效时，对妳重击和偷袭都有25%的机会无法对妳造成任何额外伤害(但被攻击到的正常伤害还是照算)。7级时，机率变成50%，13级时，机率变成75%。
